name: HashKey Group
fullText:
🌟 Disruptive Technology CEO Summit | UBS Global Wealth Management

🎙️ Anna Liu, CEO of HashKey Tokenisation, joined the panel “Stablecoin, the new global currency?” alongside industry leaders from @OffchainLabs (original creators of Arbitrum) and @Noumenadigital

📸 Highlights https://t.co/1ywbtnVVjJ

name: Solar (Solana中文社群)
fullText:
全球金融架构的底层正在被重塑，越来越多的传统机构正在参与这一变革，纳斯达克也在积极推进代币化! 

Solana 基金会主席 @calilyliu  在接受CNBC的采访时也分享了她的观点，以及Solana未来将在这场变革中扮演的角色，互联网资本市场已经到来。 https://t.co/nrROS9pr0b
